classitems.description: Event fired when a remote stream has become available. - This occurs after the user joins the room. - This is changed from addPeerStream event. - Note that addPeerStream is removed from the specs. - There has been a documentation error whereby the stream it is supposed to be (stream, peerId, isSelf), but instead is received as (peerId, stream, isSelf) in 0.5.0.
classitems.name: incomingStream

params.name: peerId
params.description: PeerId of the peer that is sending the stream.

classitems.description: Event fired when a message being broadcasted is received. - This is changed from chatMessageReceived, privateMessage and publicMessage event. - Note that chatMessageReceived, privateMessage and publicMessage is removed from the specs.

classitems.description:
Event fired when a data transfer state has changed.
- Note that <u>transferInfo.data</u> sends the blob data, and
  no longer a blob url.
classitems.name: dataTransferState

params.name: peerId
params.description:
PeerId of the peer that has a data
  transfer state change.

props.name: percentage
props.description:
The percetange of data being
  uploaded / downloaded.

props.name: data
props.description:
The blob data. See the
  [createObjectURL](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/URL.createObjectURL)
  method on how you can convert the blob to a download link.

props.name: transferType
props.description:
Is error from uploading or downloading.
  [Rel: Skylink.DATA_TRANSFER_TYPE]

  and the quality of the resolution or audio may change to suit.

Set video stream resolution in the sdp.

classitems.description:
Parses the bandwidth configuration.
- In low-bandwidth environment, it's mostly managed by the browser.
  However, this option enables you to set low bandwidth for high-bandwidth
  environment whichever way is possible.

- options: The configuration.
- userMedia: The getUserMedia constraints.

Stores the list of available StreamTrackList.
- This is not supported in Firefox yet, but you can select the tracklist
  in Firefox when getUserMedia is invoked.
classitems.name: StreamTrackList

return.description:
Returns an array of audio and video tracks.
- audio: The audio track list.
- video: The video track list.
